Package ru.nsu.lavrenenkov.graph

Interface Graph<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdjListGraph, AdjMatGraph, InMatGraph
public interface Graph<T>
Interface for working with graph.

  • Method Details

    • addNode

      void addNode(Node<T> node) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds node to graph.
      Parameters:
      node - - unique node
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if node already exists in graph.

    • deleteNode

      void deleteNode(Node<T> node) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Deletes node from graph.
      Parameters:
      node - - unique node
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if no such node with given id in graph

    • getNeighbors

      List<Node<T>> getNeighbors(Node<T> node) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns list of neighbors.
      Parameters:
      node - - unique node
      Returns:
      List of node IDs that have an edge originating from the node with the given ID.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if no such node with given id in graph

    • addEdge

      void addEdge(Edge<T> edge) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds directed edge from node with idFrom to node with idTo.
      Parameters:
      edge - - edge to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - if no such node/nodes with given id/ids in graph

    • deleteEdge

      void deleteEdge(Edge<T> edge) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Deletes directed edge from node with idFrom to node with idTo.
      Parameters:
      edge - - edge to delete
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - if no such node/nodes with given id/ids in graph or if nodes exists but not an edge between them

    • getNodes

      List<Node<T>> getNodes()
      Returns all ids of nodes in graph.
      Returns:
      List of ids
